jump_scares.spoiler: Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
An infected slams onto the window of the kitchen door
Another infected slams onto the kitchen door
An infected’s arm breaks through the window
A woman appears screaming for help
An infected guest suddenly lunges at Koldo from within the police car
An infected’s arm breaks through the door
An infected reaches through the window and kills one of the characters
An infected suddenly runs out in front of Clara
The Medeiros girl from the first two films appears in the TV screen’s reflection behind Koldo
SpongeJohn appears from the darkness
As the light flickers on, an infected appears behind the glass window
The same infected bursts through the window and attacks Natalie
An infected appears in the kitchen door window
An infected attacks Clara
An infected lunges out from a doorway
Guzman appears behind Angela
Edwin, now an infected, suddenly turns around and snarls
Anciana, as an infected, suddenly screams
An infected is revealed behind the door
An infected appears and attacks a soldier
A monkey appears and shrieks
The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
The alien’s tongue comes out of its mouth and slams into the glass barrier
An alien hand grabs Dr. Gediman and pulls him into the hole
A broken hose drops down and starts hissing behind Elgyn. [Video]
An apparently dead man suddenly jumps up and yells
A Face Hugger jumps on to Ripley’s face
Purvis is suddenly shot
The alien snaps at Ripley
An alien roars from behind Call
The dying alien suddenly roars at Call once more
The rover door is suddenly opened after the children question where the adults are
Burke puts his face near a tank when suddenly one of the creatures slams against the inside wall of the tank
The team walk through a corridor when a silhouette runs past the screen
One of the crew members finds a body which suddenly opens its eyes when its head is lifted
An alien attached to the wall jumps off to grab one of the crew members
An alien pokes its head through the door before the group begin to leave
Ellen emerges from underneath the bed and is suddenly attacked by a small alien
After setting off the sprinklers, Ellen is jumped at again by the small alien
One of the men looks into the vents and spots a group of aliens approaching
Pvt. Vasquez looks at an upwards opening in the vent and spots an alien coming down
The pair start to go up the elevator when an alien reaches in
When the crew land, Bishop is attacked by an alien
Ellen’s ankle is grabbed as she tries to climb the ladder
The bear appears in the foreground in the heavily zoomed shot, with a dramatic music chord
The phone in the foreground rings loudly, and Sari jumps up on the bed, startled by it
A sudden cut to a bear’s paw reaching for the lunch, with a dramatic music chord
A bear quickly runs across the frame in the background, accompanied by a scare chord
Peter is suddenly grabbed from behind and pulled back with force
After a few seconds of drawn out tension, the bear finally lunges towards the park ranger in the foreground with a roar
Just when Sari finally decides to step out from behind the tree, the bear’s paw suddenly smashes into it
The bear’s paw breaks through the glass and grabs the teenager’s head
A bloodied hand suddenly smashes against the window in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
After a long buildup of tension, a broom falls across the doorframe in front of the medic, startling him
The bear barges through the door in front of the medic
A creature comes into view in the crack
A creature jumps at Friend as he turns around
The creature snarls to stop Gunner
A creature suddenly appears in the view hole
One of the killerbots pierces through the poster with its arm
A phone suddenly starts ringing, startling Mike
Something falls from the ceiling towards Alison
A killerbot appears right behind Alison
A screeching cat jumps out in front of Alison
A tree smashes through the kitchen window
An alligator jumps through the wooden stairs in the basement
The alligator jumps out from behind the daughter
Another alligator attacks the daughter from behind a wall
The alligator jumps at the opening of the wall
An alligator jumps at the glass store window
An alligator jumps at the cop through the basement
The alligator jumps at the daughter from the water
The alligator snaps at the father
A large swarm of bats fly out of a cave at two men
A fast moving assailant attacks a man
Vlad turns around and the vampire suddenly appears right in front of him
Vlad suddenly appears out of a swarm of bats

movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

jump_scares.spoiler: America turns around and strange and Wong are standing behind her
America looks into a puddle and suddenly an eye pops out
Wanda sees a reflection of the Scarlet witch in the window
When Wong turns around a monster suddenly roars
A woman with a shield suddenly attacks Wanda coming out of the steam
A man approaches a dark hole and after a long focus on the hole Wanda suddenly pops out
As red smoke begins forming in the background there is 2 seconds of silence and then suddenly a demonic looking Wanda snaps a man’s neck
After a long focus on a door labeled “Blast door” Wanda suddenly pops out with red glowing eyes
Wanda suddenly pulls America backwards by magic force
When Christine approaches a seemingly dead evil strange his eye suddenly opens accompanied by a scare chord
After Christine opens Strange’s eye, an evil soul suddenly fly’s towards the screen
Strange’s 3rd eye suddenly opens while he screams
In a recap of the first movie, a drowned Jason comes out of the water and grabs Alice
A cat jumps in through the window
One of the campers scares the others by disguising himself into a masked killer
A hand holding a hammer suddenly appears and hits the police officer
Mark gets hit by a machete and falls down the stairs
Jason comes up from under the sheets
Jason stands up facing Ginny
Jason’s hand breaks through the window
A pitchfork breaks through the door
Jason starts reaching into the car
Jason leaps toward her as she’s running away
Jason jumps in through the window and grabs Ginny
A sudden noise comes from the locked room when the family is eating dinner
As Jin-Seok is attempting to open the door,  his brother comes quietly and makes Jin-Seok scare
Jin-Seok is attacked by a frightening woman standing on his right
A snake slithers out of the rabbit cage
A hand reaches out and grabs Chris
The motorcycle gang member gets stabbed by a pitchfork
Chuck suddenly bumps into Debbie
A bag falls from the ceiling
A hanging corpse falls from the tree
A corpse is thrown through the window
The corpse comes alive for a second facing the soldier
One of the monsters attacks a soldier
The camera suddenly cuts to a monster
A monster suddenly turns around facing the camera
The monster in the corner that disappeared reappears from the side
Eriko suddenly springs up from her sleep and gasps
The train suddenly shakes, startling the group
Kato suddenly pulls the trigger, shooting Eriko
A sword suddenly flies out of the fog and stabs Kato
A car suddenly explodes
Gantz suddenly closes its compartments with a loud mechanical noise
While the player left behind by the bus runs to catch up to it, he is suddenly tackled by the zombie from the side
Lorit suddenly punches the framed picture on the wall, causing the glass to shatter
The woman outside is suddenly slammed against the phone booth while the doctor is inside it
As Lorit and Cleo look out of a window, a woman suddenly jumps in through the glass
A sudden bang startles the group
While giving a speech, the coach is tackled from the side by a zombie
Diago is grabbed by the mouth and pulled into a room
A zombie jumps out of the back seat
A zombie arm smashes through the door and grabs Diago
Several compartments suddenly come out of the sphere with a loud mechanical noise
The alien child suddenly spits a strange goo over the group
The child suddenly implodes, splattering black goo all over the room
Kishimoto suddenly tackles the alien from the side
Several compartments once again suddenly come out of Gantz
The presumably dead alien jumps back up behind Kato
The alien loudly implodes
The large statue implodes, sending rocks flying everywhere
The statue suddenly begins to move, attacking Kurono with its swords
As the statue’s reflection slowly becomes visible, it attacks, shattering the glass
The statue suddenly begins to attack at extreme speed
The camera pans back and reveals Danny standing in the doorway
Jang Kyung-chul breaks the window of the car
Jang Kyung-chul leaps from the left and tackles Jang Se-yun
A beaver swims past Walt
Walt suddenly surfaces in front of the boat
Kelly and Hank’s boat flips over
Hank moves a branch to reveal Hector standing behind it
The crocodile jumps out of the water and bites off a man’s head
Hank is pulled into the air by a trap
Kelly stands on a branch and a decomposing head flies out at her
The crocodile jumps up and grabs the helicopter
The crocodile surfaces beside the helicopter
The crocodile appears in front of Hank
The crocodile surfaces once more beside the helicopter
The crocodile grabs Hector
A man is thrown backwards through a door, hitting a wall
A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen
A TV suddenly turns on
A shadowy figure suddenly attacks Derek
Madison suddenly gasps as she sees a dead body
A shadowy figure suddenly slams the front door shut as Madison is trying to escape
Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest
A gas pump nozzle suddenly splatters a man’s face with gasoline (accompanied by a loud sound)
An electric knife turns on and cuts a woman’s arm (again, accompanied by a loud sound)
A lawnmower turns itself on
Seemingly dead man suddenly gets up with a scream
A sound effect plays as Jeremiah becomes agitated when asking Marlene to fetch Brother Swan
As the lights flicker, the Black Skulls suddenly grab Red and Mandy from their beds
Accompanied by a sound effect, Red looks in a bedroom to see a dead couple covered in blood
There is a loud gunshot and the television blows out
As Red tastes the contents of the jar, he violently hallucinates and some unsettling imagery flashes across the screen
Someone breaks the car’s window
Zoe lunges at Benny from outside the frame
A crossbow shot suddenly hits the hood of the car
Benny’s grandmother appears from behind a corner with a yell and swings a bat at him
During a quiet moment, Zoe suddenly opens the door in the foreground, making noise
Right as Benny attempts to take a swing, someone grabs the bat from behind
During the opening plane scene, immediately after a soldier vomits, heavy machine gun fire pierces the hull of the plane
After Boyce reaches dry land, he hears voices in the distance but is forced to duck when heavy gunfire rings out around him
Loud gunfire may startle some as one of the Americans is executed by Nazi soldiers
As the soldiers walk across a field on the way to the rendezvous point, a landmine explodes as one of the soldiers says “that way, you get a cut of the profits”
Boyce approaches a slightly ajar door to look at Chloe’s aunt. He hears a noise behind him and turns around, when he looks back a disfigured person is standing in front of the door
Chloe starts talking from behind Boyce
After the scientist and soldier leave, Boyce looks through the hole in the wall once more and this time a mutated person lunges towards the camera
As Boyce inspects the tar pit, something moves in the bag suspended above it
As Chase walks away from Wafner (who appears to be unconscious) saying “I think I’m gonna need…” he is suddenly tripped by Wafner
As Chloe talks to Paul in the tunnel, a mutated person reaches in and pulls her off screen
Ford turns around after setting the explosives and Wafner is standing directly in front of him
Wafner is suddenly shot after saying “I am a god, Corporal”
A flock of birds fly out at Billy as he sees several flayed corpses hanging in the trees
Dillon almost runs into Mac
Blood splatters on Blaine’s shoulder
The Predator is suddenly caught in the net just as Dutch begins to turn back
Mac puts his hand over Dillon’s mouth
The Predator shoots a laser at Poncho from the trees
The Predator traps Dutch’s head between two spikes that come out of its arm
A grotesque looking hand comes through the roof of Abby’s car
A patient opens his mouth to reveal his diseased tongue
A zombie breaks into El Wray’s truck
Carlos stands up and Hague is suddenly standing right behind him
A zombie bites Carlos on the arm as he goes to give Tolo his ring back
A car explodes
While feeding his wife some soup, Earl briefly looks away and when he looks back his wife has transformed into a zombie. [Video]
A burning man bumps into Dakota’s car
A crow bar slams into Dakota’s car window
An apparently dead J.T. suddenly sits up and points his gun at Hague
There is a single gun shot as Dakota walks towards the house
Block grabs Dakota by the hair
Zombies break into the restaurant
A zombie runs out of some bushes
A zombie appears in the doorway behind Jeong
As Jeong raises his rifle to look through the scope, a group of zombies suddenly appears in the night vision
The zombie in the driver’s seat suddenly opens his eyes, accompanied by a loud noise
A car slams into the side of the truck
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
A man knocks on a car window, startling the occupant
A woman’s head suddenly explodes
A man’s head explodes
There are several loud gunshots
Mike is hit over the head with a fire extinguisher as he descends some stairs
A woman is shot in the head (followed by several more people over the next minute or so)
A man’s head explodes unexpectedly
A man is shot (somewhat unexpectedly)
In a dark tunnel, a boys face suddenly appears
Dylan closes his gun safe door to reveal his wife unexpectedly standing there
A horse suddenly bolts out of it’s stall
A scary man suddenly appears in front of Dylan
As Adela pulls a lever to free a goat from it’s cage, a bar suddenly clamps down on her neck
Darius suddenly hits a ‘Rabbit Head’ man who is attacking Adela
A masked man with an axe bangs on the truck cab window
A masked man with a sledgehammer attacks Dylan
A bat skeleton suddenly falls from the ceiling right in front of Adela
A presumed to be dead body that is pinned against the wall, suddenly attacks Adela
The sound of a gun lever action is suddenly heard behind Adela
An eye suddenly opens in the socket of a Texas Longhorn skull
Skeletor suddenly appears beside Isaiah
Skeletor appears behind a man trying to pry open the ATM
As Isiah rounds a corner he bumps into Kels and his gang
As Isiah walks down a dark corridor, a man with his face covered appears behind him
Skeletor grabs Nya from behind as she looks at her phone
After Isiah and Nya fist bump, a man in a mask suddenly appears in front of them
An arm reaches out to grab Nya as she walks up the church steps
A knife blade barely misses Nya as the group runs past a construction sign
After a quiet opening scene, the title screen abruptly appears accompanied by a loud sound effect. This may startle some viewers
There is a loud bang as Carver and Anna walk past one of the Halloween maze traps. [Video]
There is another loud bang as Anna and Luke run past the same trap on the way back
David bangs on the fence as Luke hides
David stabs Anna in the leg
One of the surfers shows its fangs and begins to screech
Nicole suddenly gets in front of Chris at a very fast speed and grabs him by the throat
As a camera shows an empty room through a window, Nicole appears from the side at extreme speed
While running, Evan bumps into one of the vampires
The barn door swings open
There is a sudden flash of light revealing one of the vampires reaching out to grab Evan
One of the vampires facing away from the camera quickly turns its head to reveal that it’s fully shifted into its true form
There is a sudden screech and Chris is dragged out of screen
A lightbulb suddenly explodes
Aunt Jillian suddenly swings the door open
The security camera suddenly starts glitching
After Danielle says, “what’s happening to me?” it suddenly cuts back to the glitching security camera
A burnt hand appears from out of the pool
Illyana opens the door to find a picture of the smiley man on the wall. (Not really a classic jump scare, but still may startle some
The scene cuts to a loud shower after a freaky scene
The bear reappears over the closet and yells
A man wearing a purge mask jumps out in front of a woman walking down the street
A man appears right beside the ambulance window which startles Laney
A close up of several men being suddenly shot in the head may startle some viewers
An apparently dead man lying on a car jumps up and attacks Leo
There is gunfire from outside the ambulance
The ambulance is shot at by a helicopter
A truck slams into the ambulance
An unseen person pulls Roan out of the ambulance
Leo stabs a man in the back
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
The rear window of the truck is broken as a Hyper reaches in
Another Hyper appears behind Fred
A personal trainer zombie attacks the glass
Body parts fall from the fire escape and land on a dumpster
A pack of zombies, led by R, bust through the pharmacy lab doors
Zombie dad makes a run and lunges at Perry before being shot dead
The skeleton eaters jump and claw at the door as R and Julie escape
M runs over three skeleton eaters with a luggage cart
Julie’s dad pulls a gun on R
A dead body/zombie jumps on Julie
A zombie runs at the man from the side of the room
Tallahassee suddenly slams the brakes, sending Madison flying forward
